mapper.select: select id, pub, memberId, emotionId, regDate, content, image, 'freediary' as diary, (select count(id) from FreeDiaryComment where freeDiaryId = FreeDiary.id) count from oneul.FreeDiary where emotionId = #{field} AND pub = 1 UNION select id, pub, memberId, emotionId, regDate, content1,null,'gratitudeDiary' as diary, (select count(id) from GratitudeDiaryComment where gratitudeDiaryId = GratitudeDiary.id) count from oneul.GratitudeDiary where emotionId = #{field} AND pub = 1 order by regdate desc LIMIT #{size} offset #{offset};
mapper.insert: insert into Oneline(content, memberId, writerId, image) values(#{content},#{memberId},#{writerId},#{image})
